short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The easiest way to export Twitter followers and following.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
xExport is a FREE extension to export Twitter followers and following from any account and save them to a CSV/Excel file. It is a great tool for obtaining business leads on Twitter.

# Features

- Export Unlimited Twitter Followers
- Export Unlimited Twitter Following
- Auto Detect Twitter Username
- Smart Waiting
- Partial Export

# Contact Us

If you have any feedback or you want some fancy features, just let us know. We're just an email away.

Support Email: support@tweetsearcher.com
